welcome_message_body: Welcome to Detroit, where the rich history of Motown music meets the vibrant energy of a modern metropolis. Enjoy our world-class museums, delicious cuisine, and unique cultural experiences. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mercury Burger & Bar
restaurants.description: Mercury Burger & Bar is a burger joint located in Detroit.

restaurants.name: Slows Bar BQ
restaurants.description: Slows Bar BQ is a bbq joint located in Detroit.

restaurants.name: Ima
restaurants.description: Ima is a udon restaurant located in Detroit.

restaurants.name: Harry's Detroit Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: Harry's Detroit Bar & Grill is a american restaurant located in Detroit.

restaurants.name: Ottava Via
restaurants.description: Ottava Via is a italian restaurant located in Detroit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A mainly serves domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is dedicated to international flights and smaller regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The McNamara Terminal is the largest and busiest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport. It primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal serves a variety of domestic and international airlines, including American Airlines, United Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout both terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
